page.title: 16RECREATION W'BOURNE VALLEY
page.content: {SPECTATOR SPORTS} There are no facilities for spectator sports in this area. People travel to Dorchester, Weymouth & Southampton to watch and play games. Children play competitive sports at school. {LEISURE - Out-of-doors}No recreational facilities. Cycling is making a come- back; one family has a tandem. Other popular past-times include walking, swimming, (either in Dorchester, Weymouth or the Winterbourne Valley School pool),roller skating, gardening and golf (played at Winterbourne Came) {LEISURE - in-doors}Watching television and videos, listening to the radio, reading, collections, card games, board games, discos (nearby towns and villages). Skittles and darts are played at nearby pubs. Younger element go to Cubs and Brownies in Martinstown nearby.
